QuestData.Title: I Don't Get My Hands Dirty
QuestData.Description:
You heard Sire Denathrius. Today, I ascend to the Court of Harvesters.
You are fortunate to have the honor of witnessing my rise to power.
The traitors have barricaded the bridge ahead. Clear a path for me, so that I might cross it undisturbed.
Nothing can stand against me now that I have a Harvester's medallion.
But I will not waste my power on this rabble.
QuestData.LogDescription: Clear the bridge for Lord Chamberlain.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Echelon across the bridge at the Halls of Atonement.
